    • writeDataToFile

      public static void writeDataToFile​(Supermercado supermercado)
      This method is used to write the data from a Supermercado Object into an external .txt file.
      Parameters:
      supermercado - A Supermercado Object from which to get data and execute toString, in order for the Writer to output its data.

    • insertSupermarketIntoDB

      public static void insertSupermarketIntoDB​(javax.swing.JTextField NIFTextField, javax.swing.JTextField CCAATextField, javax.swing.JTextField localitatTextField, javax.swing.JTextField zipCodeTextField, javax.swing.JTextField addressTextField, javax.swing.JTextField phoneNumberTextField, javax.swing.JTextField emailTextField, javax.swing.JTextField areaTextField) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method grabs all the data the user has manually added in the UI in order to then insert it to the database.
      Parameters:
      NIFTextField - TextField containing the NIF String.
      CCAATextField - TextField containing the CCAA String.
      localitatTextField - TextField containing the Localitat String.
      zipCodeTextField - TextField containing the Zip Code String
      addressTextField - TextField containing the Address String
      phoneNumberTextField - TextField containing the Phone Number String.
      emailTextField - TextField containing the Email String.
      areaTextField - TextField containing the Area Integer.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - SQLException from Database's possible errors.

    • getLastCode

      public static int getLastCode() throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method selects the highest value for Codigo_supermercado in the database, and returns it as an int.
      Returns:
      Integer containing the highest value to be found in the Database's Codigo_supermercado field.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - SQLException from Database's possible errors.

    • instantiateSupermarketFromDB

      public static Supermercado instantiateSupermarketFromDB​(int supermarketCode) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method gets data from Database in order to instantiate a Supermercado Object with its specific data.
      Parameters:
      supermarketCode - int, used to identify the Supermercado in the database.
      Returns:
      A Supermercado Object, instantiaded with values from the database corresponding to its code.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - SQLException from Database's possible errors.

    • restarStock

      public void restarStock​(LineaCompra lc1) throws java.sql.SQLException, Excepciones
      Metodo que sirve para restar del stock de un supermercado una cantidad de un producto concreto. Se le pasa por parametro una lineaCompra, que es una linea compra de un carrito de compra para que el metodo vea cual es el codigo del producto y la cantidad a restar del producto. Actualiza la cantidad tanto en el programa como en la base de datos.
      Parameters:
      lc1 - lineaCompra del carrito de la que se recoge la informacion
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Puede lanzar una SQLException ya que se comunica con la base de datos
      Excepciones - lanza una excepcion si la cantidad que se quiere restar es mayor a la cantidad en stock, para que el stock no se quede en negativo

    • añadirStock

      public void añadirStock​(int codigoProducto, int cantidad) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Metodo que sirve para añadir al stock de un supermercado una cantidad de un producto concreto. Se pasa por parametro el codigo del producto al cual se le quiere añadir y la cantidad a añadir. El metodo actualiza la cantidad tanto en el programa como en la base de datos.
      Parameters:
      codigoProducto - int que identifica el producto
      cantidad - int cantidad que se sumara al stock de ese producto
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Puede lanzar una SQLException ya que se comunica con la base de datos

    • removeSupermarketFromDB

      public static void removeSupermarketFromDB​(int supermarketCode)
      This method deletes the information related to the supermarketCode parameter in the database. It also deletes anything that depends on its existence, such as its employees, or their paysheets (Transaction).
      Parameters:
      supermarketCode - int, used to identify which Supermercado you want to delete.

    • getSupermarketsFromDatabase

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSupermarketsFromDatabase()
      This method is intended to collect some data from the database, and make a String out of it, which then will be saved in the returned ArrayList. Its main function is to populate a JComboBox.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing a String for each different entry on the Supermercado Table in the database.
